General.Name: Globlex Holding Management Public Company Limited
General.Description: Globlex Holding Management Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in securities, investment, financial, and gold businesses in Thailand. It operates through Holding Business, Securities Business, and Other Business segments. The company offers securities underwriting, investment advisory, derivatives and securities borrowing, and lending services, as well as financial advisory services; and invests in securities, financial, and other investments of publicly listed firms, government bonds, debentures, etc. In addition, it engages in investment of small to medium enterprises supported by government policies. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
